price: 25. Kuwa riddoobay (gaalnimo ku noqday) kaddib marka hanuunka u caddaaday, shaydaan baa u qurxiyey oo rajo (been ah) geliyay.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱرۡتَدُّواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَدۡبَٰرِهِم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَى ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ سَوَّلَ لَهُمۡ وَأَمۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ir'taddū ʿalā adbārihim min baʿdi mā tabayyana lahumu al-hudā al-shayṭānu sawwala lahum wa-amlā lahum
